overview:
Marc Brown is currently the CTO and Co-Founder of Anchor Intelligence.

Prior to co-founding Anchor Intelligence with Jim and Ron, Mr. Brown was CTO at Vendavo, where he led the overall design of the Vendavo system, an enterprise-class J2EE application for price management. Before that, Mr. Brown was the Architect of the Ariba client, an N-tier Java system. Prior to his work at Ariba, Mr. Brown was a research scientist at Digital’s Systems Research Center for a decade, where he was a world-renowned researcher in software visualization, user interfaces, and browsing the web. Mr. Brown also serves as a Director of the American Computer Science League, a non-profit organization that run computer contests for high school students.

Mr. Brown received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Brown University in 1987. His thesis, Algorithm Animation, was honored with the prestigious ACM Distinguished Doctoral Dissertation award and was published by the MIT Press. Dr. Brown is also the co-author of Software Visualization published by MIT Press.
